verses.verse: I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G2136>Euodia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G846>Syntyche<s%>, <S%G5426>to<s%> be of the same mind <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

Yea <S%G2532><s%>, I <S%G2065>beseech<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G4805>yokefellow<s%>, <S%G4815>help<s%> these <S%G846>women<s%>, for <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G4866>labored<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2815>Clement<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4904>fellow-workers<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>.

Finally <S%G3063><s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G4586>honorable<s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G53>pure<s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745>things<s%> are <S%G4375>lovely<s%>, whatsoever <S%G3745>things<s%> are of good <S%G2163>report<s%>; <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G703>virtue<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%>, think <S%G3049>on<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>.

The <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3129>ye<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, these things <S%G4238>do<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3171>greatly<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>length<s%> ye have <S%G330>revived<s%> your <S%G5426>thought<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>; wherein3739, Esther9 ye did <S%G5426>indeed<s%> <S%G2532>take<s%> <S%G5426>thought<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> ye lacked <S%G170>opportunity<s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> in respect <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G5304>want<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G3129>learned<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> state I <S%G1510>am<s%>, therein to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G842>content<s%>.

I know1492, 2532 <S%G1492>how<s%> to be <S%G5013>abased<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I know also <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G1722>abound<s%>: in <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> have I <S%G3453>learned<s%> the secret <S%G2532>both<s%> to be <S%G5526>filled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G3983>hungry<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be in <S%G5302>want<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> ye yourselves <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G5374>Philippians<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> had fellowship <S%G2841>with<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3056>matter<s%> of <S%G1394>giving<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>receiving<s%> <S%G3361>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%>;

Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1934>seek<s%> for the <S%G1390>gift<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G1934>seek<s%> for the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> that <S%G4121>increaseth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G568>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2532>things<s%>, and <S%G4052>abound<s%>: I am <S%G4137>filled<s%>, having <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G1891>Epaphroditus<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that came <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, an <S%G3744>odor<s%> of a sweet <S%G2175>smell<s%>, a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> <S%G1184>acceptable<s%>, <S%G2101>well-pleasing<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G4137>supply<s%> every3956, 5216 <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G5216>yours<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.
